frisk.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to search someone for hidden weapons, drugs etc by feeling their body with your hands
frisk.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We were frisked at the airport.
frisk.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if a young animal frisks, it runs and jumps playfully
frisk.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The lambs were frisking around the pen.
